thread.title: IIT Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Sr Project Asst, Project Scientist & Other Posts

author: publisher12
title: IIT Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Sr Project Asst, Project Scientist & Other Posts
text: Click here - IIT Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Alumni Relationship Manager & Teaching Fellow Posts: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Delhi has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Alumni Relationship Manager & Teaching Fellow vacancies. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format on or before 13-02-2017 for S.No-1 & 20-02-2017 for S.No-2. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. IIT Delhi Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 05 Name of the Posts: 1. Alumni Relationship Manager: 01 Post 2. Teaching Fellow: 04 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be 40 years for S.No-1. Educational Qualification : Candidates should posses Post Graduation Degree with through 60 % marks along with 3 years of relevant experience for S.No-1, M.Tech Degree from a reputed Institute/University in CSE or ECE with good academic record throughout/ MSc Degree in Maths with good academic record for S.No-2 Posts. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in Interview for S.No-1. How to Apply: For S.No-1: Eligible candidates can send their detailed CV in the prescribed format mail to registrar@iiitd.ac.in & admin-hr@iiitd.ac.in with subject line as “Post of (Name of post)” at IIIT-D” on or before 13-02-2017. For S.No-2: Eligible candidates can send their CV to admin-hr@iiitd.ac.in with subject line as “Application for Teaching Fellow” along with names of three references on or before 20-02-2017 Important Dates: Last Date for Receipt of Application for S.No-1: 13-02-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application for S.No-2: 20-02-2017. For more details like pay scale, experience, duration & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt for S.No-2 IIT Delhi Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Jr Project Attendant Posts: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Delhi has invited applications for the recruitment of Jr Project Attendant vacancies for the different projects. Eligible candidates may walk in test/ interview on 15-02-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IIT Delhi Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 02 Name of the Posts: 1. Jr Project Attendant: 01 Post 2. Jr Project Attendant: 01 Post Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelors Degree for Post 1, 12th class passed, Two years of experience in Computer Networking for Post 2. Selection Process: Selection will be based on test/ interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview along with application in prescribed format, educational qualifications indicating percentage of marks of each examination passed, details of work experience and a recent passport size photograph, along with original certificates on 15-02-2017. Important Dates: Date& Time of Interview for Post 1: 15-02-2017 at 04:00 PM. Date & Time of Interview for Post 1: 15-02-2017 at 05:00 PM. Venue: Room No. 432, Block-II, Department of Mechanical Engineering, IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi-110016. For more details like funding agency, duration of the project, consolidated pay & other information click on the link given below…
